id_n.desc: Unique positive numeric identifier for filing unit

income_wages_t.desc: Income from Salary, other personal income based on employment and pensions (discounting exemption limits)

income_donations_t.desc: Income from non-exempt donations (discounting exempt amounts)

form.2019: Obtained from data on Salaries & codes

transfers_donation_nongov.desc: Gross incomes from donations received from non-governmental sources

transfers_donation_otherHH.desc: Gross incomes from donations received from other households

income_rent_t.desc: Income from Property income and property rights (rents) (discounting allowed 35% as a deduction)

rent_building_abroad.desc: Gross Income received from renting a building abroad

rent_building_mx.desc: Gross income received from renting a building in Mexico (gross amount)

income_dividends_t.desc: Gross income from Dividends and other income earned by participating in the profit

income_interest_t.desc: Gross income from interest on loans, bonds and other securities

wage_w_pr.desc: gross wages from work performed under regular pay arrangements

piecework_w_pr.desc: Gross income from piecework or task-based compensation

comissions_w_pr.desc: Gross income from commissions earned from sales or other performance-based compensation

overtime_w_pr.desc: Gross income from overtime pay for work done beyond regular hours

rewards_w_pr.desc: Gross income from Rewards or incentive payments given to employees for performance

bonus_w_pr.desc: Gross income from Bonuses received from the employer

vacation_w_pr.desc: Gross income from Vacation pay provided to employees based on their employment contract

profit_sharing_w_pr.desc: Gross income from Profit-sharing payments based on company earnings

profit_sharing_w_se.desc: Gross income from Profit-sharing payments in second employment

christmas_bonus_w_pr.desc: Gross income from Christmas bonuses received as part of year-end compensation

christmas_bonus_w_se.desc: Gross income from Christmas bonuses in second employment

wage_bu_t.desc: Gross income from Wages from business units or external contract arrangements

layoff_w_t.desc: Gross income from Layoff compensation or unemployment benefits attributable to the fiscal year

transfers_pension_mx.desc: Gross income from pension plans within Mexico

transfers_pension_abroad.desc: Gross income from pension plans abroad

other_other_lastmonth.desc: Gross income from other work-related sources or payments received in the last month

other_other_prev5.desc: Gross income from other work-related sources or payments received in the previous five months

wage_w_se.desc: Gross income from Wages from second employment

lotteries.desc: Income received from lotteries and other similar games of chance

capital_bonds.desc: Income received from sales of bonds in stock exchange

layoff_pending.desc: Income received from sales of bonds in stock exchange

pending_capital_t.desc: Income received from sales of bonds in stock exchange

business_general_t.desc: Income received from business and professional activities of the individual

business_simp_t.desc: Income received from business and professional activities of the individual subject to simplified regime (RESICO)

gross_wage.desc: Gross wage calculated from various wage components (e.g., piecework, commissions, overtime, bonuses, etc.)

gross_income_ex.desc: Gross income amount including exempt incomes

gross_total_income.desc: Gross Total Income (wages, interest, rent, dividends, donations, capital gains and other sources)

tax_c_income.desc: Total Income for PIT purposes (cumulates wages, interest, rent, dividends, donations, capital gains and other sources)

authorized_deduction.desc: Amount from deductible expenses that complies with limits for deductions

highest_rate_applied.desc: Marginal rate of the bracket corresponding to taxable income

capitalgains_pitax.desc: Tax on incomes from capital gains in stock market sales of bonds

pending_pitax.desc: Tax on incomes from capital gains in stock market sales of bonds

business_resico_pitax.desc: Tax on incomes from business and professional activities in the Simplified Regime

business_general_pitax.desc: Tax on incomes from business and professional activities

pitax.desc: Total PIT liability (including additional tax on dividends)
